pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Estimation of Generalized Graded Unfolding Model Parameters // Provides a Metropolis-coupled Markov chain Monte Carlo sampler, post-processing and parameter estimation functions, and plotting utilities for the generalized graded unfolding model of Roberts, Donoghue, and Laughlin (2000) doi:10.1177/01466216000241001.
